author: sayguh

comments.content: Ken, can you come up with more descriptive titles for your posts?
Looks similar to Papyrus ::shudder:: but that’s not it.

Not sure what you mean by more descriptive pattyfab.. I’m asking someone to ID a common font.. not sure what else I could say.

Yea, papyrus is a bit similar david but I don’t think that’s it either

Ken, everybody is asking us to ID a font. If you look at the titles of the other threads you’ll see things like

Scrambler Marie’s

or

Jamie Oliver logo sans typeface

Even something simpler like “Deco Sans” or “Papyrus like font” will help.

These kinds of titles make it easier to find the thread and distinguish it from the others (including your own). It also saves Yves a little work having to creatively rename it.
